channel.title: Wiki on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content in Wiki on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: Basic Commands
item.description: Table of Contents (Click to expand) Discord Home Teleportation Chat Island/Cave Areas Grief Prevention Miscellaneous Commands Argument Required <> Required [] Optional Discord In order to join discord, you need to run the command /discord in game, this will give you the invite link in your chat window. Home These commands are affecting by your rank.

item.title: Contributing
item.description: To contribute to this wiki all you need to do is follow this handy little guide! All of these steps require a Github account! Steps: First Second Third Fourth First Step There's two ways to do this: If you just want to simply edit one of the existing pages you just click the Edit this page in the top right of the page! Then skip to Step 3

item.title: Guides
item.description: Table of Contents (Click to expand) Chunk Loaders Always Online vs Online Only Checking Your Balance Creating a Chunk Loader Viewing Active Chunk Loaders Reading Chunk Coordinates Claiming How to Claim 2D vs 3D How to Subdivide Crates MultiMC How to Install Login to your Profile Allocate More Ram Setup an Instance With Link With ZIP Archive Cannot Find instance.
